entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
